> > elves aren't perfect to me because of the similarities of their
> > attacks. not to mention they are slow as molasses.
>
> I would like to point that characters who are "slow as molasses" have
> an easier time using teleporters than characters who are "faster than
> light", but that's a discussion for another time.

Thats a game flaw, not a character flaw :)

Any character, regardless of speed, should be able to easily use
teleporters, doors, etc - the ideal situation is to be able to slow your
character down (like walk/run settings) and probably also change the way
teleporters work.

But thats getting away from the topic, I don't have any comments on
characters except that there are a lot of balance issues that I'm sure
you'll all have fun arguing over :)

- Deathifier
